Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This product, valued at $8,000 to you, represents a significant investment in quality, innovation, and functionality. I am offering you the opportunity to own this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $7,200. This exclusive offer is designed to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our premium product. Should you choose to accept, I assure you, it will be a decision you won't regret. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
